title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While spaghetti cooks, cook the pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, cheese, and pepper.
Drain spaghetti, reserving some pasta water. Immediately toss with pancetta and egg mixture (off the heat!).
Add a splash of pasta water to create a creamy sauce. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or bake the chicken (Tikka).
Saut√© onions, ginger, and garlic, then add crushed tomatoes and spices.
Stir in the heavy cream and the grilled chicken.
Simmer for 15 minutes. Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Quick and healthy stir-fried vegetables with a savory sauce, perfect for a weeknight meal.
instructions: Mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, water, and cornstarch to create the sauce.
Heat oil in a wok or large pan.
Stir-fry harder vegetables (carrots, broccoli) first for 3-5 minutes.
Add softer vegetables (peppers, mushrooms) and stir-fry for 2 more minutes.
Pour in the sauce and stir until it thickens. Serve over rice.

title: Classic Beef Burgers
summary: Juicy grilled beef patties served on a toasted bun with all the fixings.
instructions: Gently form the ground beef into 4 equal patties. Make a small thumbprint in the center of each.
Season both sides with salt and pepper.
Grill or pan-fry the patties to your desired doneness.
Toast the buns.
Assemble the burgers with your favorite toppings and serve.
